query: SELECT c.id as course_id, c.title, COUNT(tm.id) as module_count FROM courses c LEFT JOIN training_modules tm ON c.id = tm.courseId GROUP BY c.id, c.title
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3VC7xi4RHX81jG7.65112bc774d1 --database K34VNBtbDJyjtW8qhrCBdB --execute SELECT c.id as course_id, c.title, COUNT(tm.id) as module_count FROM courses c LEFT JOIN training_modules tm ON c.id = tm.courseId GROUP BY c.id, c.title
